item.title: Enable In-memory search using Amazon ElasticSearch Service üîç
item.description: AWS ElasticSearch Service This article provides guidance on setting up an Elasticsearch cluster with Kibana on AWS (Amazon Web Services) cloud platform using CloudFormation. Also, it provides the user with instructions on how to access the cluster and Kibana endpoints. Need for Elasticsearch and Use Cases Elasticsearch is a managed AWS (Amazon Web Services) service for Log analytics and management. A common use case is Monitoring Infrastructure or Application Performance and assisting in failure diagnosis.
